testcase.name: User Registration
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the registration page.........................................passed When I register with valid details..........................................passed Then I should see registration success......................................passed

testcase.name: Add Product to Cart
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Desktops category page....................................passed When I add a desktop product to the cart....................................passed Then The product should be added to the cart................................passed

testcase.name: Select Dropdown on Product Page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on a product details page........................................passed When I select 8GB RAM option from dropdown..................................passed Then The dropdown selection should be applied...............................passed

testcase.name: Select Radio Button on Product Page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on a product details page........................................passed When I select HDD option....................................................passed And I add the product to the cart...........................................passed Then The product should be added with HDD option............................passed

testcase.name: Open Cart Page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the home page.................................................passed When I open the shopping cart...............................................passed Then The shopping cart should be displayed..................................passed
